doc:
Chris Noel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Noel 0 Chris Noel (born July 2, 1941) is a Californian actress of the 1960s. Star of a dozen beach party movies in the 1960s, she is perhaps best known by veterans of the Vietnam war for her work on the Armed Forces Radio And Television Service as the "Voice of Vietnam". Noel made frequent visits to troops and was shot down twice in helicopters. Her radio program "A Date With Chris" is fondly remembered by many Vietnam vets. Her pin up pictures were very popular. Chris_Noel ( born July_2_,_1941 ) is a_Californian_actress of the_1960s . Star of a_dozen_beach_party_movies in the_1960s , she is_perhaps_best_known by veterans of the_Vietnam_war for her_work on the_Armed_Forces_Radio_And_Television_Service as the_"_Voice of Vietnam_" . Noel made frequent_visits to troops and was_shot down_twice in helicopters . Her_radio_program " A_Date With Chris " is_fondly_remembered by many_Vietnam_vets . Her_pin up pictures were very_popular .
